TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsSignatureDefinition extends System.Object

span.span: Represents an digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 XPS 包中的签名定义的详细信息，请参阅 XML 纸张规范中的第10章， (XPS) 可从下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 。For more information about signature definitions in XPS packages, see Chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). 有关 数字签名的信息，请参阅 MSDN 文章中提供的开放打包约定的数字签名框架 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494) 。For information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). 有关 XPS 的信息，请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 可供下载 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) 。For information about XPS see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和设置的属性 。The following example shows how to create and set the properties of an . summary.span: 获取或设置签名者在签名时所依据的签名目的协议的字符串值。

span.span: Gets or sets the string value of the signature intention agreement that the signer is signing against.

value.span: 一个表示目的协议的 ，例如“I have read and agree”。

span.span: A that represents the intention agreement; for example, "I have read and agree."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 `Intent` Xml 纸张规范中的签名定义的元素 (XPS) 包的详细信息，请参阅 Xml 纸张规格 (xps) 规范中的第10章，可在 [Xps：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)获取该规范。For more information about the `Intent` element of signature definitions in XML Paper Specification (XPS) packages, see chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. summary.span: 获取或设置被请求对包进行签名（或已签名）的人员的身份。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity of the person who is requested to sign (or has signed) the package.

value.span: 一个 表示签名者的，例如 "Mary，行销部门"。

span.span: A that represents the signer, for example, "Mary Jones, Marketing Dept."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于 `SignerName` `SignatureDefinition` XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 包中元素的属性。This property corresponds to the `SignerName` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an XML Paper Specification (XPS) package. 请注意名称之间的差异。Notice the difference in the names. 有关属性的详细信息 `SignerName` ，请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (xps) 规范的第10章，可在 [Xps：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)获取。For more information about the `SignerName` attribute, see chapter 10 of the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

summary.span: 获取或设置请求的签名者必须对指定文档的各部件进行签名的截止日期和时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the date and time by which the requested signer must sign the parts of the specified document.

value.span: 一个 () ，表示签名者必须对包进行签名的期限。

span.span: A () that represents the deadline by which the signer must sign the package.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 `SignBy` XML 纸张规范中的签名定义的元素 (XPS) 包的详细信息，请参阅 xps 规范（可以在 [Xps：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)中获取）。For more information about the `SignBy` element of signature definitions in XML Paper Specification (XPS) packages, see the XPS specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. summary.span: 获取或设置对包进行签名时所在位置的法律管辖区。

span.span: Gets or sets the legal jurisdiction where the package is signed.

value.span: 一个表示管辖区的 ，例如“State of Utah, United States”。

span.span: A that represents the jurisdiction, for example, "State of Utah, United States."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于 `SigningLocation` XML 纸张规格 (XPS) 包中的签名定义元素。This property corresponds to the `SigningLocation` element of signature definitions in XML Paper Specification (XPS) packages. 请注意名称之间的差异。Notice the difference in the names. (XPS) 包的 XML 纸张规范的原始制造者可以设置此属性。The original producer of the XML Paper Specification (XPS) package can set this property. 或者，如果没有其他人已经签名，则签名者可以在对包进行签名时设置属性。Optionally, the signer can set the property at the time of signing the package if no one else has already signed. 有关元素的详细信息 `SigningLocation` ，请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (xps) 规范中的第10章，可在 [Xps：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)获取该规范。For more information about the `SigningLocation` element, see chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的唯一标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this .

value.span: 一个 () ，表示签名定义的 ID。

span.span: A () that represents the ID of the signature definition.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将 `Signature` 元素链接到此 ，您必须将 `Id` 的属性设置 `Signature` 为属性的值 。To link a `Signature` element to this , you must set the `Id` attribute of the `Signature` to the value of the property. 有关元素的详细信息 `Signature` ，请参阅 [开放打包约定](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) 架构。For more information about `Signature` elements, see the [Open Packaging Conventions](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema. 若要详细了解 `SpotID` `SignatureDefinition` Xml 纸张规范 (xps) 包中元素的属性，请参阅 Xml 纸张规格 (xps) 规范中的第10章，可在 [xps：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)获取。For more information about the `SpotID` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an XML Paper Specification (XPS) package, see chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个位置，该位置指定在 XML 纸张规格 (XPS) 文档中显示可见数字签名的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location that specifies where to display the visible digital signature in an XML Paper Specification (XPS) document.

value.span: 一个 ，表示对签名的可见请求在包中出现的位置。

span.span: A that represents the location in the package where a visible request for a signature appears.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 `SpotLocation` Xml 纸张规范中的签名定义的元素 (XPS) 包的详细信息，请参阅 Xml 纸张规格 (xps) 规范中的第10章，可在 [Xps：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)获取该规范。For more information about the `SpotLocation` element of signature definitions in XML Paper Specification (XPS) packages, see chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
